name: Hunter Sniper SHOOT Game
description:
Hunter Sniper SHOOT Game is a striking action FPS sniper game! True 3D graphics and sound effects, allowing you to experience the real sniper experience. The game brings an exciting experience to complete the task. Keep your breath, lock the enemy, aim, shoot, kill the crazy enemies
Features:
- Various types of weapons, sniper rifles
- realistic 3D screen, show the sound of the environment
- First Person FPS Action Shooting Game
- Simple and smooth control
